Title: Relates to the promotion of sergeants
Summary: Relates to the promotion of sergeants; grants a sergeant who has served for a period of fifteen years the same rights in respect to the police pension fund as a sergeant detailed to act as sergeant commander detective squad or sergeant special assignment.
LawCode: Amd ยง14-114, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to promotions of sergeants
